name: Farming Fun
description:
You have inherited a rundown farm from your father. Revitalize the farm you grew up on as a child. Customize your farmer. Purchase crops and animals in the market and place them to create a unique farm layout. Level up and grow your farm back to its hay-day.

Game Controls:

Up/Down/Left/Right: Up/Down/Left/Right arrow keys

Market Access: E 

Purchasing in Market: Enter
